index.title: Developer Toolbox
index.description: A collection of essential web development tools with a clean, Google-inspired interface.

whatIs.title: What is Developer Toolbox?
whatIs.content: Developer Toolbox is a comprehensive collection of essential web development tools, designed with a clean, Google-inspired interface. Our mission is to provide developers with quick access to commonly needed utilities without the clutter.

whyBuilt.title: Why We Built This
whyBuilt.content: As developers, we often find ourselves searching for simple tools to format JSON, encode Base64, generate hashes, or test regex patterns. Instead of bookmarking multiple websites, we created a single, unified platform that houses all these essential tools.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.content: All operations are performed client-side in your browser. We don't store, track, or transmit any of your data. Your information stays private and secure.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Welcome to Developer Toolbox! Our tools are designed to be simple and intuitive. Just click on any tool from the homepage to get started.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafety.answer: Yes! All processing happens in your browser. We don't store or transmit any of your data.

accountRequired.question: Do I need to create an account?
accountRequired.answer: No account required. Just visit and start using the tools immediately.

offlineUsage.question: Can I use this offline?
offlineUsage.answer: Once loaded, most tools work offline as they run entirely in your browser.

dataProcessing.content: All data processing occurs entirely within your web browser. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of the data you input into our tools. Your information never leaves your device.
